verses.roman:
mora nāma la-iha,--'teho pāṭhāilā more
toṁāra sthāne kṛṣṇa-kathā śunibāra tare'

synonyms: mora—My; nāma—name; la-iha—take; teho—He; pāṭhāilā—sent; more—me; tomāra sthāne—from you; kṛṣṇa-kathā—topics of Kṛṣṇa; śunibāra tare—to hear.
translation: "You can take My name before him, saying, 'He has sent me to hear about Lord Kṛṣṇa from you.'
